### Statistical Thinking Across Borders:<br> Building Bridges and Expanding Horizons in Clinical Biostatistics


::: {.callout-important}
# Latest News

**ISCB46 has concluded!** We hope you enjoyed the conference and wish you a safe trip back home! We would like to thank all the course, talk, and poster presenters for contributing to ISCB46 in Basel, and hope to see you again at [<b>next year's ISCB GMDS 2026 conference in Freiburg, Germany</b>](https://iscbgmds2026.info){.external target="_blank"}!

**Video recordings are currently being processed, you will be notified once these are available.**

All presented abstracts are available in [<b>the conference book</b>](data/ISCB46_Conference_Book.pdf).

See the **[FAQ page](faq.qmd)** for frequently asked questions.
:::
